title: Midnight Purple
description: A dark theme with purple accents for nighttime browsing
css: :root { --complexity-accent: #8b5cf6; --complexity-bg: #1a1625; --complexity-surface: #2d1b3d; --complexity-text: #e2e8f0; --complexity-text-muted: #94a3b8; } body { background: var(--complexity-bg) !important; color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .bg-white { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; } .text-gray-900 { color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .text-gray-600 { color: var(--complexity-text-muted) !important; } .border-gray-200 { border-color: #4c1d95 !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; }

config.title: Midnight Purple
config.customCss: :root { --complexity-accent: #8b5cf6; --complexity-bg: #1a1625; --complexity-surface: #2d1b3d; --complexity-text: #e2e8f0; --complexity-text-muted: #94a3b8; } body { background: var(--complexity-bg) !important; color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .bg-white { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; } .text-gray-900 { color: var(--complexity-text) !important; } .text-gray-600 { color: var(--complexity-text-muted) !important; } .border-gray-200 { border-color: #4c1d95 !important; } .hover\:bg-gray-50:hover { background: var(--complexity-surface) !important; }
